project.title: Employee Performance Management | Part 3
project.description:
This module is intended to provide awareness on Employee Performance Management. There are five parts to this module. Each part of this eLearning is accompanied with activities that require participants to meet up with their supervisors and discuss related issues learned. In Part 3, learners will be exposed to:
• Coaching, Review and Feedback • The techniques and approach used for coaching and feedback
Content Owner : LCD, GHRM Duration : 15 minutes Assessment : Objective setting with Supervisor
